properties.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Eastern/Central El Paso County; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southwest Desert/Mimbres Basin; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley; Western El Paso County; Sierra County Lakes
properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 11:51AM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
A winter storm is causing a mix of precipitation across portions
of southern New Mexico and west Texas early this afternoon. Snow
is now falling around Truth or Consequences...Hatch and Deming New
Mexico while a mix of rain and sleet has moved across the El Paso
Texas area. Rain meanwhile continues to fall around las Cruces
New Mexico. In addition wind gusts around 30 to 40 mph are
occurring over some locations.

The mix of rain snow and sleet are expected through this
afternoon and tonight with up to 3 inches of snow possible mainly
for areas north of Las Cruces. Dangerous driving conditions
may exist including across sections of Interstates 10 and 25.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM AFFECTING SOUTHERN NEW MEXICO AND WEST TEXAS
